application_type_full: Approval of details reserved by a condition (discharge)
description: Details of the facing materials (slate), section through the new mansard screen, new dormers, windows and external doors, including any new sections of shopfront to Bell Yard, new internal joinery associated with external doors, new internal doors, new fire rated glazed partitions, new stairs, including any extensions to existing stairs, architectural drawings showing any historic structure and fabric to be removed and the relationship of any new structural elements to retained fabric, any new internal ramps, any physical manifestations of internal services (fitted joinery to conceal fire safety and security control boxes and fan coil units) and indicative service routes, fixing locations and fixing details for any new internal light fittings (wall lights) pursuant to Condition 4 (part) and Condition 6 (b) (part), (c), (d) (part), (e), (f), (g), (h), (i), (j) (part) and (k) (part) of listed building consent dated 27 March 2023 (RN 22/07560/LBC).
